text: Benjamin Seth Watson (born December 18, 1980) is a former American football tight end. He was drafted by the New England Patriots 32nd overall in the first round of the 2004 NFL Draft. He won Super Bowl XXXIX with the Patriots over the Philadelphia Eagles in his rookie year. He played college football at Duke and Georgia. Watson also played for the Cleveland Browns, Baltimore Ravens, and New Orleans Saints. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American football tight ends Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:New England Patriots players Category:New Orleans Saints players
title: Benjamin Watson
